LanguageData.TM_Lesser_SentinelR.label: Lesser Sentinel
LanguageData.TM_Lesser_SentinelR.description: This once inanimate stone is now viciously defending its terrain. Limbs that once seemed fused together as the same stone are now mobile... and tearing through earth and flesh alike.
LanguageData.TM_Lesser_SentinelR.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.TM_Lesser_SentinelR.tools.1.label: teeth
LanguageData.TM_Lesser_SentinelR_Leather.label: Lesser Sentinel leather
LanguageData.TM_Lesser_SentinelR_Corpse.label: Lesser Sentinel corpse
